name: Time is Solid Here (DEMO)
description: A hallway and three paintings to clean. Explore the first of these in the demo for Time is Solid Here! Use the arrow keys to move around, spacebar to interact, and escape to go back - or move by clicking where you want to go and double clicking to interact. Furthermore, you should start the game using the "Enter" command on the main title - a save, found by pressing "Carry On", was put there by me only for testing purposes. The current music is a placeholder and is not owned by us!
